definition:
Let $\mathbb C$ be the set of complex numbers. We define an equivalence
relation on $\mathbb C^2-\{0,0\}$ by
$$(x1,y1) \sim (x2,y2) \Leftrightarrow \exists \lambda \in \mathbb C^* \lambda (x1,y1)=(x2,y2)$$

The set $\mathbb C^2-\{0,0\}/\sim$ is a projective variety called the
complex projective line.
